mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM life_order.order_entry o left join life_order.order_item_snapshot s on s.order_id=o.id where o.id=#{orderId}

SELECT
FROM life_order.order_entry o inner join life_order.order_item_snapshot s on s.order_id=o.id where o.partner_user_id=#{passportId} and o.type=4 and o.status=8 and o.payment_type=-1 and o.trans_type='CASH' and o.payment_time < date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') order by o.id desc

select
from life_order.order_entry o where o.trans_type in('ALIPAY_JS','WEIXIN_JS') and o.type=4 and o.status=8 and o.shipping_passport_id=#{passportId} and o.total_price in
#{amount}
and o.payment_time between date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and not exists(select 1 from life_order.order_item_snapshot s where s.order_id=o.id) order by o.id desc

SELECT sum(ois.total_price-ois.cost_price) sumMoney FROM life_order.order_entry oe inner JOIN life_passport.passport pt on pt.id=oe.partner_user_id INNER JOIN life_order.order_item_snapshot ois on ois.order_id=oe.id WHERE pt.id=#{id} AND oe.type=4 AND oe.status > 8 AND oe.payment_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT sum(ois.total_price-ois.cost_price) sumMoney ,count(1) count FROM life_order.order_entry oe inner JOIN life_passport.passport pt on pt.id=oe.partner_user_id INNER JOIN life_order.order_item_snapshot ois on ois.order_id=oe.id WHERE pt.id=#{id} AND oe.type=3 AND oe.status in(8,256) AND oe.payment_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT pi.id piId ,pi.item_name itemName ,ois.item_template_id itemTemplateId ,it.id itId,it.title itTitle ,sum(ois.normal_quantity) sumCount ,sum(ois.cost_price*ois.normal_quantity) sumCostMoney ,sum(ois.total_price) sumTotalMoney FROM life_order.order_entry oe INNER JOIN life_order.order_item_snapshot ois on ois.order_id=oe.id INNER JOIN life_pos.pos_item pi on pi.id=ois.item_id INNER JOIN life_item.item_type it on it.id=pi.item_type_id WHERE oe.shipping_passport_id=#{merchantId} AND oe.type in(4,9) AND oe.status =8 and to_days(oe.create_time)= to_days(#{createTime}) AND it.id=#{itId} AND pi.item_name like CONCAT('%', #{itemName}, '%') GROUP BY ois.item_id ORDER BY sumCount desc

SELECT psd.passport_id cashierId,pass.real_name realName,sum(psd.amount*100) sumTotalPrice ,pca.cashier_photo cashierPhoto,#{createTime} time FROM life_pos.pos_settlement_dayly psd LEFT JOIN life_pos.pos_cashier_account pca on pca.cashier_id=psd.passport_id JOIN life_passport.passport pass on pass.id=psd.passport_id WHERE psd.merchant_passport_id=#{merchantId} and to_days(psd.create_time)=to_days(#{createTime})AND psd.is_paid=1 GROUP BY psd.passport_id ORDER BY psd.create_time DESC

SELECT * FROM ( select a.*,a.sum-a.sum*a.rate cashPrice,a.sum*a.rate ratePrice,a.total_price totalPrice from ( select t.id,date_format(t.payment_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') paymentTime,sequence_number sequenceNumber ,t.total_price,t.trans_type transType,ps.real_name realName ,t.actual_price actualPrice ,case t.trans_type when 'CASH' then 0 else if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) end rate ,CASE t.type WHEN 9 then t.total_price-t.actual_price else t.total_price END sum ,t.payment_type paymentType from life_order.order_entry t inner join life_passport.passport ps on ps.id=t.partner_user_id inner join ( select t.is_need,t.commission_rate from life_pos.pos_merchant_rate t where t.passport_id=#{passportId} union select 1,0.0038 limit 1 ) b on 1=1 where t.shipping_passport_id=#{passportId} and t.type in(4,9) and t.status =8
and date_format(t.payment_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(t.payment_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(#{createTime},'%Y-%m')
) a order by a.paymentTime desc)c

SELECT c.*,sum(c.sum-c.sum*c.rate) totalPrice,sum(c.sum*c.rate) ratePrice,sum(c.sum) cashPrice,count(1) countMap FROM ( SELECT oe.actual_price actualPrice,oe.trans_type transType,CASE oe.type WHEN 9 then oe.total_price-oe.actual_price else oe.total_price END sum ,case oe.trans_type when 'CASH' then 0 else if(b.is_need=1,b.commission_rate,0) end rate FROM life_order.order_entry oe inner join ( select t.is_need,t.commission_rate from life_pos.pos_merchant_rate t where t.passport_id=#{passportId} union select 1,0.0038 limit 1 ) b on 1=1 WHERE oe.shipping_passport_id=#{passportId} and oe.type in(4,9) and oe.status =8
and date_format(oe.payment_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(oe.payment_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(#{createTime},'%Y-%m')
) c GROUP BY c.transType
